SEARCH
Module JBubbleBobble
Package game.model.powerups

Class PowerupFactory

java.lang.Object
game.model.powerups.PowerupFactory
public class PowerupFactory extends Object
The PowerupFactory is responsible for generating power-ups in the game. It tracks various game metrics and based on these metrics, determines the types of power-ups to spawn. The factory is also responsible for determining the appropriate spawn position for power-ups on the game level.

      Calculates the percentage difference between two values.

    • getPowerupsConditionCompletions

      public HashMap<Class<? extends Powerup>,Float> getPowerupsConditionCompletions()
      Retrieves the completion percentages for various power-up conditions. These percentages are based on the difference between the current game metrics and the spawn conditions for each power-up. Only positive percentage differences are included.
      Returns:
      results a map where the key is the power-up class and the value is the percentage completion of that power-up's spawn condition.

    • createPowerup

      public Powerup createPowerup(PowerupManager powerupManager)
      Creates a power-up based on the current game metrics. This method selects the top two power-ups with the highest spawn condition completion and creates the first available power-up.
      Parameters:
      powerupManager - the power-up manager that handles power-up interactions.
      Returns:
      the created power-up or null if no power-up could be created.

    • createRandomPowerup

      public Powerup createRandomPowerup(PowerupManager powerupManager)
      Creates a random power-up and sets its position in the game.
      Parameters:
      powerupManager - the power-up manager that handles power-up interactions.
      Returns:
      the created random power-up.

    • setPowerupPosition

      public void setPowerupPosition(Powerup powerup, PowerupManager powerupManager)
      Sets the position of the specified power-up in the game level on top of a random tile.
      Parameters:
      powerup - the power-up to position.
      powerupManager - the manager handling power-up interactions.
